docs.snippet: Two new films, a documentary and a biopic about Daw Aung San Suu Kyi, portray Myanmar (formerly Burma), a land long isolated from the West....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two new films, a documentary and a biopic about Daw Aung San Suu Kyi, portray Myanmar (formerly Burma), a land long isolated from the West.
docs.abstract: Robert H Lieberman's documentary film They Call It Myanmar: Lifting the Curtain and Luc Besson's biopic The Lady, about Daw Aung San Suu Kyi, both focus on the isolated country of Myanmar.

headline.seo: In Aung San Suu Kyi’s Myanmar: Two New Films
headline.main: Tantalized but Cautious, Filmmakers Capture Myanmar
headline.print_headline: Tantalized but Cautious, Filmmakers Capture Myanmar
